prf_utils::RangeBox

prf_utils::RangeBox Class Reference

Small utility class RangeBox. More...

#include <statistics.hh>

 Upper limit of all values.
double lower ()
 Lower limit of values.
void reset ()
 Reset to start afresh.

Detailed Description

Throw double precision values into this box and it keeps track of the range of the objects. StatBox also finds the range. So, this class is useful only when StatBox is an overkill.
